lines.text: That melted wax mess on the floor...
What? Is it some kind of clue?
Haha, nope. All sorts of wizards use candles. So... that's not really a clue about your question.
No reason, really. If those candles had been made out of some special material, it might've been a hint.
Looks like it's just wax, though. Pretty bog-standard stuff.
